lead_paragraph: Merve Buyuksarac was found guilty of insulting a public official, but her sentence was immediately suspended on the condition that she does not reoffend within the next five years.

headline.main: A Former Miss Turkey Is Convicted of Insulting President Erdogan

snippet: Merve Buyuksarac was found guilty of insulting a public official, but her sentence was immediately suspended on the condition that she does not reoffend within the next five years.
